content:
Does the file upload support self-deployed MinIO?
Hi guys, I think this project is really cool. I have been trying to deploy it myself for the past few days. In the documentation, I only saw descriptions about using S3 for file uploads. I'm wondering if it's possible to use my own self-deployed MinIO as a backend for file uploads instead of S3?
This topic was moved here from #general > File Upload by Lauryn Menard.
@wc j - Just a heads up that I moved your message to the #production help stream so folks who can answer your question will see it sooner rather than later.

@wc j: If MinIO supplies an S3-compatible API, then it should be possible. https://zulip.readthedocs.io/en/latest/production/upload-backends.html#s3-backend-configuration mentions this in passing -- you need to set S3_ENDPOINT_URL to the right domain.
thanks, i will take a look at the related documentation.
Alex Vandiver mentioned this topic in #production help > Storage settings.
